mapper.update: CREATE TABLE pms.message${value} ( msg_id varchar(50) NOT NULL , msg_type int(10) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, sender_id varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, receiver varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, service_id varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, ack boolean DEFAULT NULL, status tinyint(1) DEFAULT NULL, reservation_time datetime DEFAULT NULL, server_id varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, expiry int(10) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, qos tinyint(1) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, retained tinyint(1) DEFAULT NULL, issue_time datetime DEFAULT NULL, update_time datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (msg_id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=395 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
